mapper.select: select count(*) from usertable where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into usertable ( user_id, user_passwd, user_name, user_email, user_tel, user_address, user_address2, user_address3 ) values ( #{userId}, #{userPasswd}, #{userName}, #{userEmail}, #{userTel}, #{userAddress}, #{userAddress2}, #{userAddress3} )
